scripts.build: npm run build -w packages/shared && npm run build -w apps/api && npm run build -w apps/frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint -w apps/api && npm run lint -w apps/frontend && npm run lint -w packages/shared
scripts.test: npm run test -w apps/api && npm run test -w apps/frontend && npm run test -w packages/shared
scripts.typecheck: npm run build -w packages/shared && npm run typecheck -w apps/api && npm run typecheck -w apps/frontend && npm run typecheck -w packages/shared
